metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14686 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Artifex MuPDF 1.11 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service via a crafted .xps file, related to a "User Mode Write AV near NULL starting at wow64!Wow64NotifyDebugger+0x000000000000001d" on Windows. This occurs because read_zip_dir_imp in fitz/unzip.c does not check whether size fields in a ZIP entry are negative numbers.

notes.Note: msalvatore> see function xps_read_zip_dir() in trusty

criterions.comment: mupdf package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12.0+ds1-1').
